== Main inclusion report for tdb ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' `http://people.ubuntu.com/~lamont/buildLogs/libt/libtut/0.0.20040326-6/`, compiled on any arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' Build-dependency of libtagcoll, the package contains .cpp and .h source files used by tagcoll for self-testing

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* No executables

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: 
** only a developer package
* Bugs: <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/pkgreport.cgi?which=pkg&data=libtut-dev&archive=no&version=&dist=unstable|bugs]]</nowiki> only 1 wishlist
* No special hardware interaction.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
